from matplotlib import pyplot as plt
import cv2
source.e86dcd5f:
img_id = '--2IBUMom1I' #Unsplash image id
img_path = f"../input/unsplash-dataset-images-downloaded-250x250/downloads/{img_id}.jpg" #Path to the picture
source.db5561e1:
img = cv2.imread(img_path, cv2.IMREAD_COLOR)
img = cv2.cvtColor(img, cv2.COLOR_BGR2RGB) #Don't forget to convert color!
plt.imshow(img)
